noLangForRecipients.message: No language saved for these recipients

errorSettingSpellLanguage.message: Error: Could not set language to $1. Maybe its not installed any more?

DiscardedUpdateTooMuchRecipients.message: Discarded to save language preferences as there are too much recipients. (Max recipients are $1)

PromotionsShareMessage.message: Automatic Dictionary - Why not sharing this plugin with your followers? Everyone shoud enjoy it!

PromotionsReviewMessage.message: Automatic Dictionary - Do you like this addon? Help it by writing a review!

maxSize.info.message:
The maximum number of associations between a recipient or group of recipients 
and a dictionary language. When the storage reaches this max size, the oldest 
and less used data will be removed, leaving space for new assignments. (aka LRU).

maxRecipients.label.message: Max recipients to process per mail:

maxRecipients.info.message:
When a mail has more than this recipients, we do not save any language for them.
 (sum TOs and CCs). Useful to avoid processing massive mails.

allowPromotions.label.message: Allow to suggest you ways to promote this plugin:

allowPromotions.info.message:
We'll try to suggest you ways to help us promote this plugin, like sharing with your
mates or writing a review, or some suggestion to improve it.

notificationLevel.description.message: The level you want the plugin to show notifications. 'Info' will tell you everything it does, like change dictionary or detect new languages (default). 'Error' will only show you when something goes wrong.

notificationLevel.recommendation.message: Set it to 'Warning' if you don't want to be bothered too much.

logLevel.description.message: The level you want the plugin to log.

logLevel.recommendation.message: Set it to 'Warning' to log only when something is not working well.
